properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 5 at 3:42AM EST until February 6 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations
of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze.

* WHERE...Portions of northwest Pennsylvania and north central
and northeast Ohio.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will start as all snow during
the evening, but transition to a wintry mix after midnight. By
mid morning Thursday, precipitation is expected to change to rain
with temperatures warming slightly above freezing.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania
Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on
driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania
roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and
traffic conditions.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST THURSDAY
